last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: Alan, Davie and James prepare for a final confrontation with merciless Colonel MacNab.

name: Kidnapped
overview: 15-year-old Davie Balfour is poised to receive a vast inheritance when he's lured onto a cargo ship, knocked unconscious, and kidnapped by his malevolent uncle Ebenezer, who devises a scheme to sell him into slavery. But Davie's unforeseen rescue at the hands of a Scottish rogue, Alan Breck, with them racing across the Scottish moors, with English bounty hunters in hot pursuit.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Cheated of his rightful inheritance, young Scot Davie Balfour is launched into an exciting adventure.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Davie and Alan try to escape the clutches of the slave traders, but their luck goes from bad to worse.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Alan, Davie and James prepare for a final confrontation with merciless Colonel MacNab.
